[[1994â95 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1994â95]] |} [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] (MÄ°Y) has participated in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[1993â94 Turkish Second Football League|1993â94]] season for the 20th time. Starting from the previous year the league had been played in two stages. In this season a third stage, promotion play-offs has been initiated. MÄ°Y had a bad season in ranking group and couldn't promote to promotion group and later couldn't take place in promÄ±otion play-offs. The team also participated in [[Turkish Cup]] (''TÃ¼rkiye KupasÄ±'') [[1993â94 Turkish Cup|1993â94]] and eliminated at Round 2. ==1993â94 league participation== [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] took place in Group 3 in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[1993â94 Turkish Second Football League|1993-94]] season. League played in three stages. In the first stage 50 teams in five groups (10 teams each) played for first two rankings. Promotion group was consisted of those 10 teams. At the end of the second stage top three teams promoted to [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] [[1994â95 Turkish First Football League|1994-95]]. Remaining teams in each ranking group played classification matches in relegation groups. Bottom two teams relegated to [[Turkish Third Football League|Third League]] [[1994â95 Turkish Third Football League|1994-95]] at the end of the season. In the third stage, 8 clubs (3 from the promotion group and 1 each from 5 classificaiton groups) played one-leg play-off games in Ankara to determine the next two teams to be promoted to First League.[http://www.angelfire.com/nj/sivritepe/9394/CP2L.html Cem Pekin Archives] 13 February 2010. [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] took place in Group 3 consisted of 10 teams and finished first stage at eight place. In classification group, team finished 5th and couldn't play promotion play-off games. ===Ranking group performance=== Mersin Ä°Y's league performance in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] Group 3 in [[1993â94 Turkish Second Football League|1993â94]] season is shown in the following tableStandings and results from [http://www.tff.org/Default.aspx?pageID=808&grupID=277#grp TFF second league page]. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !rowspan=2|place !rowspan=2|team !colspan=4|games !colspan=2|goals !rowspan=2|points !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|home !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|away |- !
